thread.title: Nu Skin Enterprises (NUS) in Focus: Stock Plunges 25.7%
thread.title_full: Nu Skin Enterprises (NUS) in Focus: Stock Plunges 25.7% - Yahoo Finance

author: Zacks Equity Research
title: Nu Skin Enterprises (NUS) in Focus: Stock Plunges 25.7%
text:
Nu Skin Enterprises Inc. NUS saw a big move last session, as the company’s shares fell by nearly 26% on the day. The move came on pretty good volume too with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session. Notably, NUS gained over 17% from Sep 28 to Oct 6, before it slumped about 26% yesterday.

On Oct 6, the company slashed its revenue guidance for the third quarter of 2015, on the back of weakness in China and currency headwinds. The company now expects to generate between $570-$573 million in third quarter revenue (prior guidance $600-$620 million).

The multi-level marketer has seen a flat track record when it comes to current year estimate revisions over the past few weeks and the consensus for earnings hasn’t been in a trend either. This recent price action is discouraging, so make sure to keep a close watch on this firm in the near future, and especially on earnings estimates following the recent slump.

NUS currently has a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) while its Earnings ESP is negative.

A better-ranked stock in the same sector is Coty Inc. COTY, holding a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
